title: The Villainess Lives Only For Today - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Children   Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Engagement   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnation   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Tsundere   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Fairy Tail   요정꼬리
description:
“You are going to raise that child.”

The baby's wailing rang out loudly as my father looked down on me coldly. My mother, who sat next to the corpse of my dead younger sister, was clinging tightly onto her body.

In front of my younger sister's withering corpse, I held onto her only daughter as I got kicked out of the house.

The only person I could go to was Maynus, my forgotten fiancé.

“… Is this your child?”

“No!”

The look on his face told me that he didn't believe me.
But at least he didn't kick me out?

Goodness, what do I do now?

***

I simply wanted to pay him back for his generosity as much as I could and then leave soon after.

“I'm going to leave now.”

“Where are you going?”

Huh? Why is he asking?

“I need to adjust my schedule in advance. I also need to pack our bags. Delerone must have a lot of luggage as well.”

This is weird…

“Huh… Are you coming with me?”

Maynus' face twisted into a frown, “Were you planning on leaving me here by myself?”

Am I the only one who doesn't understand what in the world is going on…?>
